snippet: Betsy Andreu watched Lance Armstrong’s interview with Oprah Winfrey, waiting in vain for Armstrong to say that she and her husband were not liars.
abstract: Betsy Andreu, wife of professional cyclist Frankie Andreu, expresses deep dissatisfaction with Lance Amrstrong's doping confession during interview with Oprah Winfrey; Andreu argues that Armstrong said nothing about his extensive persecution of people like herself, who dared to speak out about his actions.
lead_paragraph: Betsy Andreu watched Lance Armstrong’s interview with Oprah Winfrey, waiting in vain for Armstrong to say that she and her husband were not liars.

headline.seo: For Betsy and Frankie Andreu, Missing Words in Search for Closure
headline.main: Confession Falls Several Words Short of Closure
headline.print_headline: Confession Falls Several Words Short of Closure
